features: CONNECT GEARS TO BUILD YOUR OWN ROBOT: Build your own robot creations with this 116-piece STEM building set!
ENGINEER NEW ROBOTS: Design new robots, or follow along with the included Activity Guide!
LEARNING WHILE BUILDING: Master engineering, critical thinking, and other STEM skills with every build!
EDUCATIONAL TOYS FOR KIDS : WORKS with all Gears! Gears! Gears! building sets.
Super STEM Skills: From science and technology to engineering and math, STEM learning help kids build critical thinking and other skills they need for success in school and beyond!
body.description: It's a pastariffic way to pretend! Serve up imaginative Italian feasts with the realistic play food found within the New Sprouts Pasta Time set from Learning Resources. This 20-piece play food set features everything kids need for their next imaginary meals, including meatballs, ravioli, noodles, bread, and even a cheese shaker! In addition to scrumptious-looking food, New Sprouts Pasta Time also includes all of the kitchen-inspired tools needed to serve a meal, from plates and forks to tongs and a pasta strainer! Dream up imaginative dinners, introduce table etiquette, learn kitchen vocabulary, and more—this play food is ready for learning fun! Sized just right for little hands, the play food found in New Sprouts Pasta Time works with all of our popular New Sprouts line of products, as well as existing play kitchens and food sets. When playtime is finished, each piece of durable plastic play food wipes clean for easy storage.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Gears! Gears! Gears! Robots in Motion Build out-of-this-world robots that twist, turn, and move with the STEM building fun of the Gears! Gears! Gears! Super Building Set from Learning Resources!

Building New STEM Skills! When kids snap together this set's bright, colorful gears, they're learning about engineering, design, critical thinking, and other STEM skills! 110 Pieces! This 110-piece STEM building comes with everything kids need to build suggested robots or engineer their own creations! Works with All Gears! Sets! Want to build even bigger robots? Pair this set with other Gears! toys and watch your bots get bigger!

Ages & Stages Critical Thinking This toy helps kids become sharp, critical thinkers by teaching them sequential thought, problem solving, and other essential skills! Imaginative Skills Let imaginations soar with this toy that builds creativity and social skills through immersive role play! Creativity Explore your creative side with this toy that encourages self-expression while building agile thinkers!
STEM Authenticated With our STEM.org Authenticated Educational Product kids discover observation, experimentation, and other essential STEM principles

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Child LOVES it
reviews.reviewText: Amazing STEM toy for children who are into robots. Lots of design possibilities; imagination booster; fine motor skills development, confidence builder. Challenging enough to keep preschoolers focused, yet easy enough to keep them happy, unlike other STEM toys that only frustrate parents and children alike. This one is just the right balance. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My four years old got a robo friend
reviews.reviewText: My son like to assemble his robo friend with all diffenrt moving knobs. With so many possibilities of moving piece, it's really fun to play.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great robotics kit for littles! Clear pictures for builds.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Stem robot toy
reviews.reviewText: A very fun toy, helping kids to learn to build a small robot, while following simple instructions. Expect lots of small pieces, so supervision is definitely required here. Would recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my 5 year old nephew and he loved it! My 8 year old wants one now lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great foundation for building STEM skills.
reviews.reviewText: My grandson loves it and is constantly building new things.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lots of fun
reviews.reviewText: Bright, sturdy, loads of combinations are possible. Great toy to keep your little one using their imagination and keep them busy.. I am buying more kits

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I got these for my almost 4 year old, who always wants to build robots and I’m surprised how much he loves them. We have followed the i instructions once but we just love using our imagination! I’m definitely going to buy a second set

reviews.reviewTitle: Fue todo un éxito con mis hijos
reviews.reviewText: Los materiales son de calidad, se entretienen muchísimo aprendiendo y jugando.

reviews.reviewTitle: We love this as a Gears add-on
reviews.reviewText: It is a fabulous add-on !Our first for our grandchild was the one with the red continuous belt ( tread ) which is a great add-on to our basic Gears set.These kits far-out-do Meccano for this 4-6 age-group and rival the next step up in Lego above basic.BTW, if you are using DUPLO with a child, have you tried adding Lego 6-post 3x2 rectangles to Duplo pieces? One of the best kept secrets of transitioning to Lego from Duplo. We also added some basic gears to Lego just before starting with a basic GEARS kit.Hope other customers are as happy as our grandchild. And look on-line for design ideas, instructions etc.IF we had known, we would have started with GRAND-kids and skipped the Teen levels !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought for my grandson as a birthday present---he hasn't whinged at me so I presume its ok
Lo compramos para regalar porque mi hijo ya lo tenía y es sin duda su juguete preferido.
Genial! Mon ptit bonhomme de 6 ans en est fan! Il construit des tas de robots, excellent jouet 👌🏻
